structure.unit: PHYSICIANS, OSTEOPATHS, PODIATRISTS, AND RELATED MEDICAL PRACTITIONERS

law.catch_line: Abortion referral or counseling agency not to charge fee -- Penalty.

text.section: As used in this section, an abortion referral or counseling agency is any person, group, or organization, whether funded publicly or privately, that provides advice or help to persons in obtaining abortions.

No abortion referral or counseling agency shall charge or accept any fee, kickback, or compensation of any nature from a physician, hospital, clinic or other medical facility for referring a person thereto for an abortion.

law.history: Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 281, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1978.
